Architecture, Clean Design, and Empowering Technology.

In the last 10 years, I did a successful career change, founded a startup working on SaaS for management and
logistics, joined the fantastic team at Bright Pixel to help build better StayUps (contrary to startups, the former live
longer), had an amazing time translating the world with Unbabel.
